title: LMARV-1 reboot part 8: Exploring layout for multiplexed registers

media:group.media:title: LMARV-1 reboot part 8: Exploring layout for multiplexed registers
media:group.media:description:
Now that the code is mostly cleaned up, I'm exploring how to lay out the sequencer, starting with a multiplexed register module.

nMigen exercises: https://github.com/RobertBaruch/nmigen-exercises/blob/main/README.md

github repo for code: https://github.com/RobertBaruch/riscv-reboot

RISC-V specs: https://riscv.org/technical/specifications/

nMigen tutorial: https://github.com/RobertBaruch/nmigen-tutorial/blob/master/README.md
